role.argrole: thing arg0 does with no gain

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 回想) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 我们)) (VP (NP-PRP (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 移民)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 初衷) (CC 及) (NN 目的))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 总算)) (VP (VV 没有) (VP (VV 白费)))))
